skill.name: coingecko
skill.description: CoinGecko API documentation - cryptocurrency market data API, price feeds, market cap, volume, historical data. Use when integrating CoinGecko API, building crypto price trackers, or accessing cryptocurrency market data.
skill.summary: CoinGecko API documentation - cryptocurrency market data API, price feeds, market cap, volume, histo...
skill.author: 2025Emma

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown files. No executable code, scripts, network operations, or file system access. Contains API documentation for CoinGecko cryptocurrency data platform.

content.value_statement: Build crypto applications with accurate price, market cap, and trading volume data. Access comprehensive CoinGecko API documentation for integrating cryptocurrency market data into your projects.
actual_capabilities: Query cryptocurrency prices by coin ID or contract address
Get market data including market cap, volume, and price changes
Access NFT collection data and market statistics
Retrieve exchange information and trading pair tickers
Fetch historical price charts and OHLCV data
Explore onchain DEX data across multiple blockchain networks
limitations: API rate limits apply based on your CoinGecko plan
Requires your own CoinGecko API key for full access
Some advanced endpoints require paid subscription plans
Data accuracy depends on CoinGecko's exchange and onchain data sources

use_cases.title: Build Price Trackers
use_cases.description: Create cryptocurrency portfolio trackers and price alert applications using real-time market data

use_cases.title: Analyze Market Trends
use_cases.description: Retrieve historical price data and market metrics for research and trend analysis

use_cases.title: Power Crypto AI Agents
use_cases.description: Enable AI agents to access cryptocurrency data for DeFi applications and trading bots

prompt_templates.title: Get Coin Price
prompt_templates.prompt: Get the current price of bitcoin in USD using CoinGecko API

prompt_templates.title: Market Overview
prompt_templates.prompt: List the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market cap with their 24h price changes

prompt_templates.title: Historical Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the 7-day price chart for ethereum with market cap data

prompt_templates.title: Exchange Data
prompt_templates.prompt: Get the trading tickers for binance exchange for bitcoin

output_examples.input: Get the current price and 24h volume of solana

best_practices: Store your API key securely on your backend server rather than exposing it in client code
Implement proper error handling for rate limit responses (HTTP 429)
Cache API responses when possible to reduce API calls and improve performance
Use the correct API endpoint (Demo vs Pro) based on your subscription plan
anti_patterns: Hardcoding API keys in client-side code or version control
Making excessive API requests without implementing rate limit handling
Relying solely on cached data without implementing refresh mechanisms
Using query string parameters for API keys instead of headers (security risk)

faq.question: Is the CoinGecko API free to use?
faq.answer: CoinGecko offers a free Demo API with limited rate limits. Paid plans provide higher limits and access to more endpoints.

faq.question: What rate limits apply to the API?
faq.answer: Rate limits vary by plan. Demo API allows 10-30 calls per minute. Paid plans offer 50-500+ calls per minute.

faq.question: Can I use this with Claude Desktop or other AI tools?
faq.answer: Yes. CoinGecko provides an MCP server that works with Claude Desktop, Cursor, and other MCP-compatible clients.

faq.question: Is my API key secure when using this skill?
faq.answer: This skill only provides documentation. Your API key security depends on your own implementation and storage practices.

faq.question: Why am I getting rate limit errors?
faq.answer: You may be exceeding your plan's rate limit. Implement exponential backoff or upgrade to a higher tier plan.

faq.question: How does this compare to other crypto APIs?
faq.answer: CoinGecko is one of the largest independent crypto data aggregators with data from 1000+ exchanges and 200+ blockchain networks.
